title: Hadi shooting: Prime accused Faisal's parents give confessional statements
body: Parents of prime accused Faisal Karim Masud in the shooting of Inqilab Moncho spokesperson Sharif Osman Hadi today gave their confessional statements. Dhaka Metropolitan Magistrate Md Monirul Islam recorded the statements after the Detective Branch (DB) of police brought Faisal's father Humayun Kabir, 70, and mother Hasi Begum, 60, to his chamber, said a court staffer. Following the recording, the magistrate ordered to send them to jail. Details of the confessional statements were not immediately available. Hadi, an independent aspiring candidate for the Dhaka-8 constituency, was shot in Dhaka's Paltan area on December 12. On December 14, Inqilab Moncho's Member Secretary Abdullah Al Jaber filed an attempted murder case with Paltan Model Police Station against Faisal and several unnamed individuals. Meanwhile, Faisal's wife Saheda Parvin Samia, brother-in-law Wahid Ahmed Shipu, and friend Maria Akter Lima are currently on five-day remand each in connection with the case.
